name: Yonderquail
description:
Welcome to Yonderquail!

Play as a native Tucsonian quail in this massive multiplayer game. Collect the feathers and win the game!

Or play in VR to control two enormous UFOs. Move the radioactive boulders to unblock the quails' paths, light their way with your tractor beam... or just abduct them.

Credits:

2D art, UI, and concepts - Raj

3D character art and animation - OddCreampuff: https://twitter.com/OddCreampuff

Environment art - Mark Hammond: https://www.oldpueblostudio.com/

Music/sound - Nyxah: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiM8Nr5ebeWNC_6f8hzLK7w

Programming - Giezi: https://twitter.com/JoGiezi

and me, Liza: https://twitter.com/knipsch

Controls:
K&M
Movement: wasd/arrows + mouse
Jump: Space
Gamepad
Movement: left+right joystick
Jump: South button
